abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Education
            Development Project for Lao Peoples Democratic Republic is
            to assist in achieving primary education and completion in
            the nineteen poorest districts of the six poor provinces;
            improving quality; and strengthening capacities to develop
            policies and strategies to monitor and manage primary
            education. No changes are made to the project development
            objective (PDO); components; performance indicators, results
            framework, safeguards classification; institutional
            arrangements; financial management or procurement; and no
            outstanding legal covenants or audit reports.
